about_the_game:
This game containing adventure and horror elemts is intended for adult players only.

This story is a part of the Witch Chronicles series launched on Halloween. After Chelsea's disappearance, her siter Melissa decides to go on a searching mission. The search leads her to the mysterious Jester's Museum: theater that has opened in the town. The invitation seems intriguing and Melissa decides to seize the chance to find out what happened to Chelsea.

To get the adult ending, players should free all creatures from the time loop by bringing them to our world. As usual, you will be faced with a choice – to free them and let the Jester win or to seal the exhibits forever in the prisons of their own.
The adult part of the game is just an element of it, but not an option that you must choose. It all depends on the main character's choice. Upon finding herself in the museum, Melissa will have to decide whether to continue searching for her sister or to seal the cursed place.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is for adults only. Sexual content is part of the game. The game contains animated scenes of sexually explicit nature and intercourse between humans and a variety of fantasy creatures. Also light sexual assault and non-consensual sex between women and men and monsters.
The content in this game includes but is not limited to-
- BDSM
- Group Sex
- Rough Sex
- Tentacle
- Blowjo
- Masturbation with machine
- Sexual activities by men and women, women and women, multiple men and women, women and Monsters

detailed_description:
CHECK THIS OUT!


About the Game

This game containing adventure and horror elemts is intended for adult players only.

This story is a part of the Witch Chronicles series launched on Halloween. After Chelsea's disappearance, her siter Melissa decides to go on a searching mission. The search leads her to the mysterious Jester's Museum: theater that has opened in the town. The invitation seems intriguing and Melissa decides to seize the chance to find out what happened to Chelsea.

To get the adult ending, players should free all creatures from the time loop by bringing them to our world. As usual, you will be faced with a choice – to free them and let the Jester win or to seal the exhibits forever in the prisons of their own.
The adult part of the game is just an element of it, but not an option that you must choose. It all depends on the main character's choice. Upon finding herself in the museum, Melissa will have to decide whether to continue searching for her sister or to seal the cursed place.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Manjaro 23
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GEFORCE GTX 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Manjaro 23
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GEFORCE GTX 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: Jester`s Theater Museum

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 5 1024Vram
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN10
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GEFORCE GTX 10
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Searching for her missing sister, Melissa visits a mysterious museum. You are the only one to decide whether she manages to solve its mystery and what consequences it will have.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese
